Package org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.camera

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64Provider
    Basic provider that converts an image (as a byte array) to a Base64 String.
    BitmapProvider
    Basic provider that converts an image (as a byte array) to a Bitmap.
    CameraPreview
    A basic Camera preview class.
    CameraProvider
    Basic provider for taking photos using CameraAPI v1.
    CameraUtils
    Collection of useful functions for the camera.
    ImageData
    Type of Data used for images taken by the camera, stored as a byte array with orientation information.
